pages.text: $(li)Drowneds are the aquatic variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombies$(/l) that can be found on any kind of ocean and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l).$(br)$(li)When a Zombie drown, it will transform into a Drowned.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rotten_flesh)Rotten Flesh$(/l) and very rarely a $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l) upon death.
They will start to burn in contact with the sunlight.
